mapper.select:
select mno, writer, w_name, w_deptname, receiver, name_kr as r_name, department_name as r_deptname, mgroup, reno, subject, content, to_char(sendtime,'yy. mm. dd') as sendtime, to_char(ms_checktime,'yy. mm. dd') as ms_checktime, TMM.status, depthno, filecnt from ( select rno, mno, writer, name_kr as w_name, department_name as w_deptname, receiver, mgroup, reno, subject, content, sendtime, ms_checktime, TM.status, depthno from ( select row_number() over(order by sendtime desc) as rno, mno, writer, receiver, mgroup, reno, subject, content, status, sendtime, ms_checktime, depthno from tbl_message M join tbl_message_send MS on M.mno = MS.fk_mno where receiver = #{empno} and delete_status = 1
and ms_checktime is null
and scrapstatus = 1
and lower(${searchCondition}) like '%'||lower(#{searchVal})||'%'
) TM left join v_employee E on E.employee_no = writer
where name_kr like '%'||lower(#{searchVal})||'%'
order by sendtime desc ) TMM left join v_employee on employee_no = receiver left join (select distinct fk_mno, count(*) as filecnt from tbl_message_file group by fk_mno) on mno = fk_mno where rno between #{startRno} and #{endRno}

select ceil(count(*)/#{sizePerPage}) from ( select rno, mno, writer, name_kr as w_name, department_name as w_deptname, receiver, mgroup, reno, subject, content, sendtime, ms_checktime, TM.status from ( select row_number() over(order by sendtime desc) as rno, mno, writer, receiver, mgroup, reno, subject, content, status, sendtime, ms_checktime from tbl_message M join tbl_message_send MS on M.mno = MS.fk_mno where receiver = #{empno} and delete_status = 1
and ms_checktime is null
and scrapstatus = 1
and lower(${searchCondition}) like '%'||lower(#{searchVal})||'%'
) TM left join v_employee E on E.employee_no = writer
where name_kr like '%'||lower(#{searchVal})||'%'
order by sendtime desc ) TMM left join v_employee on employee_no = receiver

select department_no, department_name, team_no, team_name, total from ( select T.fk_department_no, TC.team_no, TC.team_name, TC.total from ( select team_no, team_name, count(employee_no) as total from tbl_team left outer join tbl_employee on fk_team_no = team_no where delete_status = 1 group by (team_no, team_name) ) TC join tbl_team T on TC.team_no = T.team_no ) T join tbl_departments D on D.department_no = T.fk_department_no where delete_status = 1
mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_message (mno, writer, mgroup, reno, subject, content, sendtime, status, depthno)
values(#{mno}, #{writer}, #{mgroup}, #{reno}, #{subject}, #{content}, to_date(#{sendtime},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'), default, #{depthno}+1)
values(#{mno}, #{writer}, #{mgroup}, #{reno}, #{subject}, #{content}, sysdate, default, #{depthno}+1)
values(#{mno}, #{writer}, #{mno}, null, #{subject}, #{content}, to_date(#{sendtime},'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi'), default, default)
values(#{mno}, #{writer}, #{mno}, null, #{subject}, #{content}, sysdate, default, default)

insert into tbl_message_file (mfno, fk_mno, m_systemfilename, m_originfilename, file_size) values('mf-'||seq_tbl_message_file.nextval, #{fk_mno}, #{m_systemfilename}, #{m_originfilename}, #{file_size})
insert into tbl_message_send (msno, fk_mno, receiver, ms_checktime, scrapstatus) values('ms-'||seq_tbl_message_send.nextval, #{fk_mno}, #{receiver}, null, default)
mapper.select: select n_mno, n_writer, n_subject, to_char(n_sendtime, 'yyyy. mm. dd AM hh:mi') as n_sendtime, mno, writer, subject, to_char(sendtime, 'yyyy. mm. dd AM hh:mi') as sendtime, b_mno, name_kr||'·'||department_name as b_writer, b_subject, to_char(b_sendtime, 'yyyy. mm. dd AM hh:mi') as b_sendtime from ( select n_mno, n_writer, n_subject, n_sendtime, MF.mno, MF.writer, MF.subject, MF.sendtime, b_mno, B.writer as b_writer, B.subject as b_subject, B.sendtime as b_sendtime from ( select n_mno, name_kr||'·'||department_name as n_writer, n_subject,n_sendtime, mno, writer, subject, sendtime,b_mno from ( select n_mno, N.writer as n_writer, N.subject as n_subject, N.sendtime as n_sendtime, M.mno, M.writer, M.sendtime, M.subject, M.b_mno from ( select LAG(mno) OVER (ORDER BY to_number(substr(mno,3))) as n_mno, mno, subject, name_kr||'·'||department_name as writer, sendtime, LEAD(mno) OVER (ORDER BY to_number(substr(mno,3))) as b_mno from tbl_message join v_employee on writer = employee_no where mgroup = (select mgroup from tbl_message where mno = #{mno}) ) M left join tbl_message N on N.mno = M.n_mno ) left join v_employee on employee_no = n_writer ) MF left join tbl_message B on MF.b_mno = B.mno ) left join v_employee on employee_no = b_writer where mno = #{mno}
mapper.update: update tbl_message_send set ms_checktime = sysdate where fk_mno = #{fk_mno} and receiver = #{receiver}
